name: AirCraft Mission: Prison Break
description:
Get rid of a hard time in prison. Become an epic jailbreaker from a secret transporter ship aircraft carrier prison. The security squad is transporting you to another jail for a life​ sentence for the crime you have not committed. This is your last chance to breakout free from the jail. Use simple tools to attack ship police security crew, cops, and wardens in order to run away from this hard time in torturing hell. Save yourself from counter attacks. Aircraft Carrier Prison Break adventure begins with a hard time to escape from a Prisoner transport aircraft carrier ship sailing through the sea along with the other lockdown criminals. Seek help from your cell inmates prison breaks expert for a prison breakout mission. Run for your life, escape from the inescapable security police chase and use your stealth mode to sneak away. Escape, Run & Smash police squad in Aircraft Carrier Prison Break! Play Brave criminal thrilling adventure police chase for a greater cause to plan a great crime threat for the city along the border. The rivalry between prisoners and police game takes a new twist! Be an in-charge of the jail breakout mission, dodge the real police suit to become a threat to the security of the city.

It’s a hard time staying in prison for a crime somebody else committed. Some criminal inmates jailbreaker has told an epic story about their escape from prison. Plan a plot to run away without getting caught by trained German shepherd sniff dog & shot by fierce sniper police guards & armed cops. Get ready to dodge jail warden, kill police cops, sneak away from sniff dog, escape sniper counter attacks & shoot police crew to run away from this torturing hell in Aircraft Carrier Prison Break Mission. Make use of a baseball bat or grab a rod or any attacking tool against security police officer & dog to defend yourself by hitting policemen & jail crew hard on their head & body. Get an insight of the positioning of wardens bordering the cell, sniff dogs & police cops while planning a plot of the crazy jailbreak. Your chance of survival depends upon your wisdom, how you manipulate the prisoners & careful planning of a prison breakout. Put on your extreme stealth mode to sneak out of prison with the help of your professional sniper shooter cell inmates and gang members in this amazing prison break game. Murder the police cops, kill the jail officer, shoot the trained sniper, target the German shepherd sniff dog and aim the scope on soldiers who try to stop you. Play the challenging role of a prisoner escaping the prison without getting noticed of any suspicious activity. Don’t let the officer chase, track and catch you. Hit to kill and run away from the most secure and regimented conditions!

Aircraft carrier prison break features:
- Police Chasing Prisoners
- Find and Identify the right prisoner escape route
- Amazing water Environment
- Interesting Game Play
- Smooth and intuitive controls
- Stunning & High-Quality 3D Graphics
- Thrilling and challenging Missions
- Realistic fighting
